content: Park in Singapore **Marina Promenade** is a park in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) that links [Kallang Riverside Park](/wiki/Kallang_Riverside_Park) in the north to [Esplanade - Theatres on the Bay](/wiki/Esplanade_-_Theatres_on_the_Bay) in the south. The entire park is situated on the western bank of the [Kallang Basin](/wiki/Kallang_Basin) and [Marina Channel](/wiki/Marina_Channel), along Republic Avenue and Republic Boulevard. Notable landmarks along the park include the [Merdeka Bridge](/wiki/Merdeka_Bridge,_Singapore), the [Benjamin Sheares Bridge](/wiki/Benjamin_Sheares_Bridge), the [Singapore Flyer](/wiki/Singapore_Flyer) and the [Helix Bridge](/wiki/Helix_Bridge). Marina Promenade extends across two [planning areas](/wiki/Planning_Areas_of_Singapore) in the [Central Region](/wiki/Central_Region,_Singapore) of Singapore: [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang) and [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core). Marina Promenade provides excellent scenery of the Singapore skyline, the [Singapore Sports Hub](/wiki/Singapore_Sports_Hub) as well as the [Marina Bay Sands](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Sands). The park is in close proximity to [Promenade](/wiki/Promenade_MRT_station) and [Nicoll Highway MRT stations](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway_MRT_station). This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Marina Promenade, Singapore
